title: EWG Virtual Revolutionizing Talent Thru the Metaverse
itunes:title: EWG Virtual Revolutionizing Talent Thru the Metaverse
description:
Julia Haart, CEO of Elite World Group, discusses how the metaverse is transforming the talent media industry with breakthrough virtual technology.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
